action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a computer screen. The calendar is set to week view, displaying the dates from November 11th to 17th, 2024.  The current date is Saturday, November 16th. The location is set to New York, NY, with the weather displayed as 10°C. There are two entries scheduled for Saturday, labeled "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" and "Important Meeting with". The mouse cursor is hovering over the "Important Meeting with" entry.
action.program_description: Calendar application displaying the week of November 11-17, 2024
